title: Batsaria (Greek spinach and leek pie)
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '450g chopped fresh spinach', '3 leeks, chopped', '5 spring onions, chopped', '350g crumbled feta cheese', '1 bunch parsley, chopped', '1 bunch dill, chopped', '1 bunch mint, chopped', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '250ml milk', '180ml olive oil', '1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste', '300g plain flour', '85g semolina', '1 pinch salt', '60ml olive oil', '500ml water', '100g grated Parmesan cheese (optional)', '2 tablespoons cold butter, cut into pieces', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
